name: Perception (itch) (Obnoxigen)
description:
Perception is a game that focuses on the use of the player's environment to progress through various puzzles and challenges. You play as an unnamed detective, determined to uncover the secrets of an underground cult within a city. The player must traverse the city and other various locations to battle the cultist and the demons they worship. At the player's disposal, powers such as reality warping and vision detection give a much-needed edge against the enemies faced.

As a former cop stricken with amnesia. You are enticed to follow bread crumbs left behind by none other than yourself in order to uncover and stop the plans of a cult you once were a part of. The art is designed to take a darker outlook on city life and how desolate a place with many people can feel when the streets are empty.
